description: The initiative focuses on preserving and promoting ancestral knowledge and traditional medicinal practices through the production of natural beverages. Drawing from a rich heritage, the initiative aims to empower local women and foster community development by creating a sustainable business that honors cultural traditions. The project not only emphasizes the importance of natural remedies but also seeks to enhance the economic opportunities for families in the Pacific region, ensuring the legacy of ancestral wisdom continues.
name: Semillas de Vida
